00085 template <class _Traits> void mfMeshTetra<_Traits>::addCell(ids idcell, ids *idvertices MF_DMUTEXV)
00086 {
00087         MF_ASSERT((idvertices[0] >= 0)&&(idvertices[1] >= 0)&&(idvertices[2] >= 0)&&(idvertices[3] >= 0));
00088         MF_ASSERT((idvertices[0] != idvertices[1])&&(idvertices[0] != idvertices[2])&&(idvertices[0] != idvertices[3]));
00089         MF_ASSERT((idvertices[1] != idvertices[2])&&(idvertices[1] != idvertices[3])&&(idvertices[2] != idvertices[3]));
00090 
00091         sCell* c = this->mesh->getCell(idcell);
00092         ids idv[4] = {idvertices[0], idvertices[1], idvertices[2], idvertices[3]};
00093         sVertex *v[4] = {this->mesh->getVertex(idv[0]), this->mesh->getVertex(idv[1]), this->mesh->getVertex(idv[2]), this->mesh->getVertex(idv[3])};
00094         int ns = 0 // Numero de vertices com singularidade igual a 0
00095                 , temp;
00096         int i0 = 0, i1 = 1, i2 = 2, i3 = 3;
00097         int indTemp;
00098 
00099 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00100         lockVertices(idv,v);
00101         c->lock();
00102 #endif
00103 
00104         c->clearMates(MF_MUTEXFALSE);
00105 
00106         ns = geom.orientation3D(idv, v MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00107 
00108         MF_ASSERT(ns != 0);
00109         
00110         ns = 0;
00111 
00112         if (v[0]->getNumberOfSings(MF_MUTEXFALSE) == 0)
00113                 ns++;
00114         if (v[1]->getNumberOfSings(MF_MUTEXFALSE) == 0)
00115         {
00116                 //temp = idv[0];
00117                 //idv[0] = idv[1];
00118                 //idv[1] = temp;
00119                 indTemp = i0;
00120                 i0 = i1;
00121                 i1 = indTemp;
00122                 ns++;
00123         }
00124         if (v[2]->getNumberOfSings(MF_MUTEXFALSE) == 0)
00125         {
00126                 //temp = idv[0];
00127                 //idv[0] = idv[2];
00128                 //idv[2] = temp;
00129                 indTemp = i0;
00130                 i0 = i2;
00131                 i2 = indTemp;
00132                 ns++;
00133         }
00134         if (v[3]->getNumberOfSings(MF_MUTEXFALSE) == 0)
00135         {
00136                 //temp = idv[0];
00137                 //idv[0] = idv[3];
00138                 //idv[3] = temp;
00139                 indTemp = i0;
00140                 i0 = i3;
00141                 i3 = indTemp;
00142                 ns++;
00143         }
00144         
00145         c->setVertexId(0, idv[0] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00146         c->setVertexId(1, idv[1] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00147         c->setVertexId(2, idv[2] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00148         c->setVertexId(3, idv[3] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00149 
00150         c->setMateId(0,-1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00151         c->setMateId(1,-1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00152         c->setMateId(2,-1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00153         c->setMateId(3,-1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00154         
00155         /*v[0] = this->mesh->getVertex(idv[0] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00156         v[1] = this->mesh->getVertex(idv[1] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00157         v[2] = this->mesh->getVertex(idv[2] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00158         v[3] = this->mesh->getVertex(idv[3] MF_MUTEXFALSEV);*/
00159         
00160         if(ns > 1)
00161         {
00162                 // Nenhuma face em comum
00163                 v[0]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00164                 v[1]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00165                 v[2]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00166                 v[3]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00167         }
00168         else if(ns == 1)
00169         {
00170                 // Apenas a face oposta a index1 pode ser comum
00171                 searchFace(idcell,idv[i1]);
00172 
00173                 v[i0]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00174 
00175                 if (c->getMateId(i0 MF_MUTEXFALSEV) < 0)
00176                 {
00177                         // Nenhuma face em comum foi encontrada
00178                         v[i1]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00179                         v[i2]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00180                         v[i3]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00181                 }
00182         }
00183         else
00184         {
00185                 // Qualquer face pode ser comum
00186 
00187                 searchFace(idcell,idv[i0]);
00188                 searchFace(idcell,idv[i1]);
00189 
00190                 if(c->getMateId(i0) < 0 && c->getMateId(i1) < 0)
00191                 {
00192                         v[i0]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00193                         v[i1]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00194                         v[i2]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00195                         v[i3]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00196                 }
00197                 else
00198                 {
00199                         if(c->getMateId(i0) < 0)
00200                         {
00201                                 // Nenhuma face em comum foi encontrada
00202                                 v[i1]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00203                                 v[i2]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00204                                 v[i3]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00205                         }
00206                         if(c->getMateId(i1) < 0)
00207                         {
00208                                 // Nenhuma face em comum foi encontrada
00209                                 v[i0]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00210                                 v[i2]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00211                                 v[i3]->addSing(idcell MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00212                         }
00213                 }
00214 
00215                 searchSings(idv[i0]);
00216                 searchSings(idv[i1]);
00217                 searchSings(idv[i2]);
00218                 searchSings(idv[i3]);
00219         }
00220         
00221 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00222         unlockVertices(idv,v);
00223         c->unlock();
00224 #endif
00225 }

00273 template <class _Traits> int mfMeshTetra<_Traits>::sameVertices(int idcell1, int idcell2, int iq[])
00274 {
00275         int i, j, v1, v2, nv = 0;
00276         sCell* c1 = this->mesh->getCell(idcell1);
00277         sCell* c2 = this->mesh->getCell(idcell2);
00278 
00279         for(i=0; i<4; i++)
00280         {
00281                 v1 = c1->getVertexId(i);
00282                 for(j=0; j<4; j++)
00283                 {
00284                         v2 = c2->getVertexId(j);
00285                         if(v1 == v2)
00286                         {
00287                                 iq[nv++] = v1;
00288                                 break;
00289                         }
00290                 }
00291         }
00292 
00293         return nv;
00294 }

00296 template <class _Traits> bool mfMeshTetra<_Traits>::setMate(int idcell, int idcellmate, int iq[])
00297 {
00298         int temp;
00299         for(int i=0; i<4; i++)
00300         {
00301                 temp = this->mesh->getCell(idcell)->getVertexId(i);
00302                 if((temp != iq[0])&&(temp != iq[1])&&(temp != iq[2]))
00303                 {
00304                         if (temp >= 0)
00305                         {
00306                                 this->mesh->getCell(idcell)->setMateId(i,idcellmate);
00307                                 return true;
00308                         }
00309                         else
00310                                 break;
00311                 }
00312         }
00313         
00314         return false;
00315 }

00317 template <class _Traits> void mfMeshTetra<_Traits>::searchSings(int idvertex)
00318 {
00319         mfList<ids> lista;
00320         mfList<ids> flags;
00321         sVertex *v = this->mesh->getVertex(idvertex);
00322         sSing *s = v->getSing();
00323         sSing *ants = s;
00324         sCell *atu;
00325         int i;
00326         ids iatu;
00327 
00328         lista.insert(s->getCell());
00329         flags.insert(s->getCell());
00330         s = s->getNext();
00331 
00332         while(!lista.empty())
00333         {
00334                 iatu = lista.first();
00335                 lista.erase(0);
00336                 atu = this->mesh->getCell(iatu);
00337 
00338                 for(i=0; i<4; i++)
00339                         if ((atu->getMateId(i) >= 0)&&(atu->getVertexId(i)!= idvertex)&&(!flags.inList(atu->getMateId(i))))
00340                         {
00341                                 lista.insert(atu->getMateId(i));
00342                                 flags.insert(atu->getMateId(i));
00343                         }
00344 
00345                 while((s != NULL)&&(lista.empty()))
00346                 {
00347                         if(!flags.inList(s->getCell()))
00348                         {
00349                                 lista.insert(s->getCell());
00350                                 flags.insert(s->getCell());
00351                                 ants = s;
00352                                 s = s->getNext();
00353                         }
00354                         else
00355                         {
00356                                 ants->setNext(s->getNext());
00357                                 delete s;
00358                                 s = ants->getNext();
00359                         }
00360                 }
00361         }
00362 
00363         lista.clear();
00364         flags.clear();
00365 }

00369 template <class _Traits> void mfMeshTetra<_Traits>::lockVertices(ids *idv, sVertex** v)
00370 {
00371         ids ordem[4];
00372         int temp,i,j;
00373         
00374         for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00375         {
00376                 ordem[i] = i;
00377                 for(j = i; j > 0; j--)
00378                 {
00379                         if(idv[ordem[j-1]] > idv[ordem[j]])
00380                         {
00381                                 temp = ordem[j];
00382                                 ordem[j] = ordem[j-1];
00383                                 ordem[j-1] = temp;
00384                         }
00385                 }
00386         }
00387         
00388         v[ordem[0]]->lock();
00389         v[ordem[1]]->lock();
00390         v[ordem[2]]->lock();
00391         v[ordem[3]]->lock();
00392 }
00393 
00394 template <class _Traits> void mfMeshTetra<_Traits>::unlockVertices(ids *idv, sVertex** v)
00395 {
00396         ids ordem[4];
00397         int temp,i,j;
00398         
00399         for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00400         {
00401                 ordem[i] = i;
00402                 for(j = i; j > 0; j--)
00403                 {
00404                         if(idv[ordem[j-1]] > idv[ordem[j]])
00405                         {
00406                                 temp = ordem[j];
00407                                 ordem[j] = ordem[j-1];
00408                                 ordem[j-1] = temp;
00409                         }
00410                 }
00411         }
00412         
00413         v[ordem[3]]->unlock();
00414         v[ordem[2]]->unlock();
00415         v[ordem[1]]->unlock();
00416         v[ordem[0]]->unlock();
00417 }
